professional_summary: Experienced Technical Expert and Data Analytics Mentor with expertise in database administration, data integration, and advanced teaching techniques. Proven track record in developing and maintaining databases, creating integration scripts, and designing web applications. Skilled in SQL Server management, SSIS, SSRS, and providing tailored education to students.

key_responsibilities: Assisted students of all ability levels to develop technical skills.
Advised students on Thinkful curriculum in 1-on-1 meetings.
Applied advanced teaching techniques to facilitate learning of programming concepts.
Designed and maintained databases for district applications
Managed district Operational Data Store (ODS) warehouse.
Designed and published Common Language Runtime assemblies to SQL Server containing data science models.
Optimized queries and manipulated database objects to improve SQL instance performance.
Scheduled database jobs using SSMS Job agent.
Gathered data and created reports for department directors.
Maintained data integrity for SLA reporting.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science

technical_skills:
SQL Server Administration",
            "Data Integration and ETL",

            "SSRS (SQL Server Reporting Services)",
